rewards.description:
Get the Legendary Forsaken Chaos Shotgun in Borderlands 4! These guns will be located in-game in your Rewards Center of your first character at your CURRENT level (minimum of 5).
Watch two (2) hours any creator playing Borderlands 4 between September 11 and September 30. Your SHiFT account must be linked to your gaming platform and Twitch for proper redemption. For any issues with redemption, please contact support.borderlands.com.
rewards.name: Forsaken Chaos Gun

rewards.description:
Get the Legendary Midnight Defiance Sniper Rifle in Borderlands 4! These guns will be located in-game in your Rewards Center for your first character at your CURRENT level (minimum of 5). 
Watch two (2) hours of our partnered creators playing Borderlands 4 between September 11 and September 30. Your SHiFT account must be linked to your gaming platform and Twitch account for proper redemption. For any issues with redemption, please contact support.borderlands.com.

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online - September

rewards.description: Toxic Gladiator Set & Emerald Cyber Horse Corepunk is launching a brand-new experimental Twitch Drops campaign. The full set comes in five pieces, earned step by step as you watch longer. Once complete, you’ll own the Toxic Gladiator Tier 1 set—upgradeable in-game. This is a unique color theme for Gladiator skin set that can only be obtained through Twitch Drops campaigns and will never be sold in the shop. When you add the set to your skin library, you’ll be able to choose exactly which hero gets it, just like with quest skin rewards. And that’s not all: Emerald Cyber Horse can be unlocked through Twitch subscriptions. Subscribe with two Tier 1 subs to your favorite Corepunk streamer during the campaign to claim this exclusive ride.
rewards.name: Toxic Gladiator
